%%{init: {'theme': 'base'}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User
    participant Launcher as launch_codex_orchestrator_session.ts
    participant Compiler as agentlark (Rust)
    participant Zellij as Zellij Terminal
    participant Orchestrator as index.ts (Orchestrator)
    participant AI as AI Backend (Codex/MiniMax)
    participant Timeline as dynamic_timeline.ts
    participant Logs as Log Files
    participant Memory as Memory Store

    User->>Launcher: Run with CLI args
    activate Launcher

    Launcher->>Compiler: Compile agents.lark
    Compiler-->>Launcher: agents.out.json

    Launcher->>Launcher: Parse orchestration config
    Launcher->>Launcher: Build Zellij layout (KDL)
    Launcher->>Zellij: Launch session with layout
    activate Zellij

    Launcher->>Orchestrator: Spawn orchestrator process
    activate Orchestrator
    Launcher-->>User: Session running
    deactivate Launcher

    par Timeline Display
        Zellij->>Timeline: Start timeline pane
        activate Timeline
        loop Every 2 seconds
            Timeline->>Logs: Read agent logs
            Timeline->>Memory: Read progress artifacts
            Timeline-->>Zellij: Render status
        end
    end

    Orchestrator->>Orchestrator: Load agent configs
    Orchestrator->>AI: Create backend client

    loop For each orchestration group
        Orchestrator->>Orchestrator: Resolve orchestration pattern

        alt Workflow Pattern
            loop For each agent in sequence
                Orchestrator->>AI: Run plan prompt
                AI-->>Orchestrator: Plan response
                Orchestrator->>Logs: Write agent log
                Orchestrator->>Memory: Record progress

                opt Follow-up enabled
                    Orchestrator->>AI: Run follow-up prompt
                    AI-->>Orchestrator: Follow-up response
                    Orchestrator->>Logs: Update log
                end
            end
        else Parallel Pattern
            par Execute agents concurrently
                Orchestrator->>AI: Agent 1 prompt
                Orchestrator->>AI: Agent 2 prompt
                Orchestrator->>AI: Agent N prompt
            end
            AI-->>Orchestrator: All responses
            Orchestrator->>Orchestrator: Run aggregator agent
        else Relay Pattern
            Orchestrator->>Orchestrator: Sort by relay graph
            loop Follow relay edges
                Orchestrator->>AI: Run agent with handoff note
                AI-->>Orchestrator: Response + next targets
                Orchestrator->>Memory: Store handoff artifact
            end
        end
    end

    opt Autonomous Mode
        loop Until complete or max waves
            Orchestrator->>AI: Generate dynamic agents
            AI-->>Orchestrator: Agent blueprints
            Orchestrator->>Orchestrator: Create dynamic agent configs
            Orchestrator->>AI: Run dynamic agents
            AI-->>Orchestrator: Wave results
            Orchestrator->>Memory: Store wave artifacts
        end
    end

    Orchestrator->>Memory: Save final artifacts
    Orchestrator->>Logs: Write completion status
    Orchestrator-->>Zellij: Exit
    deactivate Orchestrator

    Timeline->>Timeline: Show "Squad complete"
    deactivate Timeline
    deactivate Zellij
